poemsDataJson.list_full: いにしへの 奈良(なら)の都(みやこ)の 八重桜(やへざくら) けふ九重(ここのへ)に 匂(にほ)ひぬるかな
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: Eight-fold cherry flowers//That at Nara -- ancient seat//Of our state -- have bloomed,//In our nine-fold palace court//Shed their sweet perfume today.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Inishie no|Nara no miyako no|Yae-zakura|Kyō kokonoe ni|Nioi nuru kana
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: けふここのへに にほひぬるかな
poemsDataJson.author: 伊勢大輔(いせのたいふ)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 旧都平城京の八重桜が、平安京の宮中に咲く美しさ
